content: I'd finally set out to make my mark; to find adventure. But instead, adventure found me.
author: Lara Croft

content: Run, you bastards! I'm coming for you all!
author: Lara Croft

content: Better keep your distance then.
author: Lara Croft

content: I'm not going home.
author: Lara Croft

content: It's a no fucking way!
author: Lara Croft

content: You don't know how far I've come.
author: Lara Croft

content: This was never your destiny.
author: Lara Croft

content: Don't try me...
author: Lara Croft

content: Fuck you Rourke! I'm coming for you.
author: Lara Croft

content: I'm done searching. I want to be around the living.
author: Lara Croft

content: You won't be able to go far without me.
author: Jacob

content: We could use someone like you. You're looking for a purpose in life, we can provide it.
author: Ana

content: You're kidding me! I have seen how Trinity operates!
author: Lara Croft

content: Is that a 'no'?
author: Ana

content: It doesn't have to end this way, Lara. Another Croft doesn't have to die for this.
author: Ana

content: But I'm willing to.
author: Lara Croft

content: Well, I'm not.
author: Ana

content: Will you reconsider my offer, Lara? It's not too late.
author: Ana

content: It was too late when you betrayed my family!
author: Lara Croft

content: I can be hurt, I can feel pain. I am human, save for a human ending.
author: Jacob
